mapper.select: SELECT * FROM person FETCH NEXT 20 ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO person(user_id, person_name, person_phone, person_email, is_Gender, address, degree, career, created_At ) VALUE(#{userId}, #{personName}, #{personPhone}, #{personEmail}, #{isGender}, #{address}, #{degree}, #{career}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT person_id FROM person WHERE degree = #{degree} FETCH NEXT 20 ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(subject_id) AS recommendCount, FIRST.* FROM recommend Right OUTER JOIN ( SELECT person.user_id, person.person_id, person.person_name, person.degree, person.career, person.address FROM person ) FIRST ON FIRST.user_id = recommend.subject_id GROUP BY (FIRST.user_id) ORDER BY COUNT( recommend.subject_id) desc
